name: Mr Lonely
description:
In "Mr. Lonely", You play as a kid who is alone and tries to destroy the loneliness by making friends. Your goal is to Complete tasks and make friends after finishing the tasks you successfully destroyed your loneliness.

I would like to thank all my Team Members without them this project isn't possible.

Artist#7196

REDOOF_YT#2063

SeBu#0346

AnuragDubeyGames#1845

Roy#3338

Controls:-

W :- Moving Forward

A:- Moving Left

D:- Moving Right

S:- Moving BackWards

E:- Making Friends

F:- Killing Bad Friends (only bad).

The Game "Mr. Lonely" is made for the UGDC game jam on unity. 

The Game "Mr. Lonely" Does not Break any GameJam Rules,
